issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem isn't valid and it can't be fixed.
resolution.name: Invalid

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: dynamic_semijoin_reduction_sw test should use partition with some rows.
fields.summary: dynamic_semijoin_reduction_sw test should use partition with some rows.

comments.body: I think its better to have hive (cachedstore) handle empty partitions correctly.
Will create another bug to fix this in cachedstore .
